name: obsidian-tebla-plugin
description: Spaced repetition in table format. Uses modern FSRS algorithm.

scripts.buildApp: docker compose run app sh -c "tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production"
scripts.afterDepsUpdate: npm run down && npm run buildImage
scripts.version: docker compose run app sh -c "node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json"

author: Alexander Sorokin
